name: Al Giardino Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very good find. Is out of main area of Venice, 15mins by bus. Enjoyed staying away from the hustle and bustle, room was really nice, clean, nice breakfast and the staff were very friendly. Bus stop is less than a minutes walk away, and location was good. Fanatstic traditional restaurant across the rd.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
too far from venice
reviews.text: In May, I visited Venice, Italy and had booked two nights at “Al Giardino B & B”.

aka: Al Giardino Bed And Breakfast Province Of Venice, Italy
description: Our B&B, the "Bed and Breakfast Al Giardino" is situated very close to the centre of the historic city of Venice and to the old centre of Mestre, in the Veneto region of Italy. Our Bed & Breakfast offers, at € 35.00 per person per night, in Venice, a room with private bathroom, breakfast and parking all-inclusive! In Venice, bed and breakfasts (B&B) are a great alternative to hotels, lodges, pensions, inns and hostels: the "Bed and Breakfast Al Giardino" offers you the opportunity to benefit from a service with one of the best price/quality ratios in the city. Our B&B is handy for the motorway, the Venice - Santa Lucia and Venice - Mestre Railway Stations, Venice - Marco Polo International Airport and Venice - Treviso Airport, and the Passenger Terminal of the Port of Venice. In addition, you can move easily from our B&B throughout the Venice Metropolitan Area using the public transport system, adding enjoyment to your holiday!
